title: Does anyone else think honour capsules are kinda pathetic?
body:
So I got honour 4 recently and I'm happy there's that and it's not that I'm whinging. I just think that getting a champion shard from an honour capsule is like 'why bother?'. Like a skin shard, a ward skin, a summoner icon. Yep those are awesome. A soraka champ shard? Why even bother getting my hopes up. I like the idea of a reward incentive but if the reward is this... then just don't bother. 

https://ibb.co/g3wn4v

Like why bother?
I'd have been more satisfied with a popup that just said, 'GJ for not being an asshat and being friendly to your teammates'.

Also what did you guys get from the honour capsules?
